title: Reuters Newsmaker: Confronting gun violence
text:
Reuters Newsmaker: Confronting gun violence 12:56am GMT - 59:34 
On the eve of the 'March For Our Lives' organized by the students of Parkland, Florida, Reuters leads a policy discussion with members of the gun violence prevention movement and advocates for safer schools.   
On the eve of the 'March For Our Lives' organized by the students of Parkland, Florida, Reuters leads a policy discussion with members of the gun violence prevention movement and advocates for safer schools.  //reut.rs/2GmkCjd
